effects.name: PENETRATE_SHIELD
DIRECT_DAMAGE_4
effects.script:
func on_use(target):
				var card = Main.cards[self.enemy][target]
				card.structure -= max(4-card.shield,0)
				card.update()
				card.node.add_child(load('res://scenes/effects/torpedo.tscn').instance())

effects.name: SUICIDE
effects.script:
func on_use(ally,target):
					var unit = Main.cards[self.owner][ally]
					var card = Main.cards[self.enemy][target]
					card.structure -= max(unit.structure-card.shield,0)
					card.update()
					destroy_unit(ally,owner)

effects.name: REDUCE_DMG_2
effects.script:
func on_use(target):
					var card = Main.cards[self.enemy][target]
					card.damage = max(card.damage-2,0)
					card.shield = max(card.shield-1,0)
					card.update()
					card.node.add_child(load('res://scenes/effects/virus.tscn').instance())
